name: SIGEMAAR
description:
SIGEMAAR is a learning application in the form of an educational game designed to help players learn motion system material. There are 3 choices of learning materials, namely bones, joints and human muscles.

SIGEMAAR has three main features namely "AR", "Study Material" and "Quiz"

Quiz is a SIGEMAAR game feature where players can practice their knowledge after studying in the material feature. This game aims to remember the material that has been previously learned. This quiz consists of 3 levels, namely easy, medium, and difficult. You have to get a minimum of score 7 to unlock the next level.
